sections.heading: Disbursements for protection, preservation, and administration of seized propertyThe sheriff may make all necessary disbursements for the protection, preservation, and administration of property under seizure, which shall be taxed as costs of the seizure
sections.text: Disbursements for protection, preservation, and administration of seized propertyThe sheriff may make all necessary disbursements for the protection, preservation, and administration of property under seizure, which shall be taxed as costs of the seizure.
